Jogo muito bom, vale muito a pena.

I cannot overstate how absolutely unappealing it is to play this steaming dungpile-of-a-game. Face endless waves of  toxic trolls and disgusting try-hards who's greatest achievements in life are putting other people down. The most toxic, hateful community you'll ever find, coupled with stupid, senseless mechanics that make every moment of gameplay pure agony. Overpriced DLC does nothing to balance game or to make it more fun. Don't buy this sorry excuse for a game, you will regret wasting both your money and time.

get good and bully killers...ez day

A grindy game for the perks you really want too but killers are all fun and have their quirks if you want to try between them. Want to be edgy and fast? Play the Legion. If you want to be a snipe god with hatches play huntress. Survivor, play in any play style though they won't all have the same results, sometimes people can be toxic but overall you can ask someone for help if you're new. Hope you all enjoy if you give the game a try.

I want to like this game. It is really well made. But there is more toxicity than a nuclear power plant and eventually the game becomes a chore. Buy this game depending on how you can handle people saying to KYS.
If you have a group of friends to play with its incredibly fun, but if you are playing by yourself you might get burned out after a few hours

I think they've already done pretty good job so far,Dead by daylight is the most fun game I've ever played. The game has no shortcomings. The maintenance is normal at 11:00 p.m. but I haven't seen the world. The game jam is my computer problem. The game server is silky smooth. I'm in the red section team to exercise my technology. The ancient book task is efficient and convenient. Not only that, the official also updates a lot of lovely characters and beautiful skin, The activity rewards are rich and not liver, which is the lesson of the game. The game interface is very neat, the role modeling is very handsome and lovely, and the art work is also very exquisite. All the characters are moderately difficult to start, and the game experience is very good. I can't play Shuanghuang. It's because my hands and brain don't match. The online matching and dropping line is because my router didn't buy the right one.
Love it or hate it, No in-between

supremamente malo , totalmente desbalanceado , ya no se puede jugar de killer sin campear tunelear etc es un horror que los supervivientes tengan toda la ventaja , 1 gen = 30 segundos , persigues a uno y te caen 2 gens , es un juego que ya he jugado bastante y este desbalance ya me aburre , totems como ruina , devorador etc no los puedes usar porque encuentran el totem en segundos te los dejan al lado de un motor y quieren poner una perk para reparar mas rapido si quitas un totem , no pueden arruinar mas este juego y de superviviente aveces tambien se vuelve un asco , compaÃ±eros incompetentes , no duran ni 10 segundos parecen nuevos en el juego , full campeo y tambien a pesar de que el killer no campee los "compaÃ±eros" se ponen a reparar al otro extremo del mapa de donde estas colgado o curandose por alla y te dejan morir , ya es super aburrido este juego prefiero ver una carrera de caracoles que aguantarme tan mierd* que hay en este juego .
